CALICE::SimpleHcalCalibrationProcessor

CALICE::SimpleHcalCalibrationProcessor Class Reference

Processor which applies all calibration constants needed for the reconstruction of the HCAL, using input from an ASCII file which lists all the calibration constants. More...

Detailed Description

Processor which applies all calibration constants needed for the reconstruction of the HCAL, using input from an ASCII file which lists all the calibration constants.

N. Meyer
